package.name: Paystation_Magento_1_8_ModuleV5
package.summary: Paystation One-page Checkout with Post Back
package.description:
The Paystation 3-Party One-Page Checkout Module with Post Back for Magento 1.8 is free to download. For more information on Paystation please visit www.paystation.co.nz.
This module utilizes the Paystation Quick Look-up tool for transaction validation and Post Back tool for receiving transaction responses even if the customer re-direct is interrupted (optional).
If you are installing this module it is CRUCIAL that you follow all of the install instructions. The instructions can be found in the Release Notes tab above.
To request a free development account for integration testing please email info@paystation.co.nz.
Paystation is your ideal payments solution provider whether you are just starting out in eCommerce or are already well established and looking to leverage your existing technology for smarter payments.
